name: copilot-money-mcp
description: AI-powered personal finance queries using local Copilot Money data. Query transactions, analyze spending, and track accounts with natural language.

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Read-only query of transaction data with optional filters for date, category, merchant, account, and amount

tools.name: search_transactions
tools.description: Read-only full-text search across transaction descriptions and merchant names

tools.name: get_accounts
tools.description: Read-only query to list all accounts with balances and calculate total balance

tools.name: get_spending_by_category
tools.description: Read-only analysis of spending aggregated by category for a specified time period

tools.name: get_account_balance
tools.description: Read-only lookup of detailed information for a specific account by ID or name
